title: (x) Mobi logo - Digitalis {Nick Cooke}
content:
Trying to figure this one out.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/mobi_logo_4290.gif)
author: wnf

comments.content:
Looks like Digitalis squooshed.

[Digitalis](http://web.archive.org/web/20070125112152/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=GTT0000004)

Nick Cooke

I think it’s so cool when we get an ID from the designer :)

- Lex
It’s a good man who knows his own child…. ;-)

Thanks.

I was quite surprised by this – I usually hate any form of horizontal scaling, but actually I think it’s an improvement in this case!

Nick Cooke
